Source.Name: perl-should-update
Source.Summary: This module provides should_update() and should_update_multi() which can be used to determine if files should be updated based on the mtime timestamps of their dependencies.
Source.Description: This module provides should_update() and should_update_multi() which can be used to determine if files should be updated based on the mtime timestamps of their dependencies.
